text: Confessing our sins may be difficult for us, but it brings us peace.  We are sinners, and we need God’s forgiveness.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus kept his wounds so that we would experience his mercy.  This is our strength and our hope.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, always be missionaries of the Gospel, every day and in every place.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Take care of God’s creation.  But above all, take care of people in need.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We remember the Philippines, Vietnam and the entire region hit by Typhoon Haiyan. Please be generous with prayers and concrete help.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: God loves us.  May we discover the beauty of loving and being loved.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Our life must be centred on what is essential, on Jesus Christ.  Everything else is secondary.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I ask all of you to join me in prayer for the victims of Typhoon Haiyan / Yolanda especially those in the beloved islands of the Philippines

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Year of Faith is about to end.  Lord, in this graced moment, help us to take the Gospel seriously.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Saints are people who belong fully to God.  They are not afraid of being mocked, misunderstood or marginalized.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We need courage if we are to be faithful to the Gospel.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I thank all missionaries, men and women who quietly work hard for the Lord and their brothers and sisters.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The fight against evil is long and difficult.  It is essential to pray constantly and to be patient.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christians know how to face difficulties, trials and defeat with serenity and hope in the Lord.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If money and material things become the center of our lives, they seize us and make us slaves

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We are all sinners. But God heals us with an abundance of grace, mercy and tenderness.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear Followers I understand there are now over 10 million of you! I thank you with all my heart and ask you to continue praying for me

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Too often we participate in the globalization of indifference. May we strive instead to live global solidarity.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The “throw-away” culture produces many bitter fruits, from wasting food to isolating many elderly people.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Being a Christian means renouncing ourselves, taking up the cross and carrying it with Jesus.  There is no other way.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The crucifix does not signify defeat or failure.  It reveals to us the Love that overcomes evil and sin.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If we are to know the Lord, we must go to him. Listen to him in silence before the tabernacle and approach him in the Sacraments.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To follow Jesus means putting him first, and stripping ourselves of all the things that oppress our hearts.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot give up in the face of evil. God is Love and he has defeated evil through Christ’s death and resurrection.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Our prayer cannot be reduced to an hour on Sundays. It is important to have a daily relationship with the Lord.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, do not be afraid of making decisive choices in life.  Have faith; the Lord will not abandon you!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Lord, have mercy! Too often we are blinded by our comfortable lives, and refuse to see those dying at our doorstep. #Lampedusa

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: When we encounter the Cross, we turn to Mary: Give us the strength, Mary our Mother, to accept and embrace the Cross!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The mystery of the Cross, a mystery of love, can only be understood in prayer.  Pray and weep, kneeling before the Cross.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The secret of Christian living is love.  Only love fills the empty spaces caused by evil.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Mercy is the true power that can save humanity and the world from sin and evil.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, you have many plans and dreams for the future.  But, is Christ at the center of each of your plans and dreams?

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Do we truly pray?  Without an abiding relationship with God, it is difficult to live an authentic and consistent Christian life.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Where we find hate and darkness, may we bring love and hope, in order to give a more human face to society.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Every marriage has difficult moments.  But these experiences of the Cross can make the path of love even stronger.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We do not become Christians by ourselves. Faith is above all a gift from God which is given to us in and through the Church.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: God’s forgiveness is stronger than any sin.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us ask the Lord to give us the gentleness to look upon the poor with understanding and love, devoid of human calculation and fear.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Church has no other meaning and finality than to witness to Jesus. May we not forget this.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: True charity requires courage: let us overcome the fear of getting our hands dirty so as to help those in need.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christ is always faithful. Let us pray to be always faithful to him.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We are all sinners, but we experience the joy of God’s forgiveness and we walk forward trusting in his mercy.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: There are many people in need in today’s world. Am I self-absorbed in my own concerns or am I aware of those who need help?

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Seeking happiness in material things is a sure way of being unhappy.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Sometimes it is possible to live without knowing our neighbours: this is not Christian.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus is the sun and Mary is the dawn announcing his rising.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To follow Jesus means to share his merciful love for every human being #prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The only war that we must all fight is the one against evil #prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I thank everyone who participated in the prayer vigil and the fast for peace.#prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Humanity needs to see these gestures of peace and to hear words of hope and peace! #prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I ask each party to follow decisively and courageously the path of encounter and negotiation #prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We ought never to lose hope.  God overwhelms us with his grace, if we keep asking.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text:
Pray for Peace!
https://t.co/1RQ7TGub8L
#prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: All men and women of good will are bound by the task of pursuing peace. #prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, pray with me for peace in the world #prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Peace is a good which overcomes every barrier, because it belongs all of humanity#prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: There is no such thing as low-cost Christianity.  Following Jesus means swimming against the tide, renouncing evil and selfishness

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: With all my strength, I ask each party in the conflict not to close themselves in solely on their own interests. #prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let the cry for peace ring out in all the world!#prayforpeace

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: With utmost firmness I condemn the use of chemical weapons.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We want in our society, torn apart by divisions and conflict, that peace break out!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: By his coming among us, Jesus transforms our lives.  In him, we see that God is love, he is fidelity he is life who gives himself.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How much suffering, how much devastation, how much pain has the use of arms carried in its wake.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We want a peaceful world, we want to be men and women of peace.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: War never again! Never again war!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for peace: peace in the world and in each of our hearts.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us ask Mary to help us fix our eyes intently on Jesus, to follow him always, even when this is demanding.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Faith is not something decorative or for show. To have faith means to put Christ truly at the centre of our lives.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The love of God is not something vague or generic; the love of God has a name and a face: Jesus Christ.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us allow Jesus into our lives, and leave behind our selfishness, indifference and closed attitudes to others.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus is the gate opening up to salvation, a gate open to everyone.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Don’t be afraid to ask God for forgiveness.  He never tires of forgiving us.  God is pure mercy.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Lord, teach us to step outside ourselves. Teach us to go out into the streets and manifest your love.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: An excellent program for our lives: the Beatitudes and Matthew Chapter 25.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot be Christians part-time.  If Christ is at the center of our lives, he is present in all that we do.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot sleep peacefully while babies are dying of hunger and the elderly are without medical assistance.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, and guide us on the way that leads to Heaven.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To be children of God, and brothers and sisters to one another: this is the heart of the Christian experience.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: One cannot separate Christ and the Church. The grace of Baptism gives us the joy of following Christ in and with the Church.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We are all jars of clay, fragile and poor, yet we carry within us an immense treasure.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: With his coming among us, Jesus came close to us and encountered us; also today, through the Sacraments, he encounters us.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The light of faith illumines all our relationships and helps us to live them in union with the love of Christ, to live them like Christ.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The security of faith does not make us motionless or close us off, but sends us forth to bear witness and to dialogue with all people.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young friends, it is worth wagering one’s life on Christ and on the Gospel, risking everything for great ideals! #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Now, young friends, we must continue to live day by day all that we have professed together at WYD.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: What an unforgettable week in Rio!  Thank you, everyone.  Pray for me. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I am back home, and I assure you that my joy is much greater than my exhaustion!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I profoundly thank all those who have worked to make WYD a success and I embrace all of you who were present. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We need to model our lives on the life of Jesus, so as to share his sentiments and his thoughts. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, be true "athletes of Christ"! Play on his team! #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot keep ourselves shut up in parishes, in our communities, when so many people are waiting for the Gospel! #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young friends, learn to pray every day: this is the way to know Jesus and invite him into your lives. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Bishops are the pastors of the People of God.  Follow them with trust and courage. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: There is no cross, big or small, in our life which the Lord does not share with us. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Every Friday is an opportunity to remember how much Jesus has suffered for us.  Lord, never let us forget how much you love us.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: What an unforgettable welcome in Copacabana!  May God bless you all! #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The measure of the greatness of a society is found in the way it treats those most in need, those who have nothing apart from their poverty.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Christian life is not limited to prayer, but requires an ongoing dedication and courage born of prayer. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May sports always be a means of exchange and growth, never of violence and hate. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us thank Blessed John Paul II for WYD and for the many vocations born during these 28 gatherings. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Never forget, young friends:  The Virgin Mary is our Mother and with her help we can remain faithful to Christ. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young friends, Christ has confidence in you and he entrusts his own mission to you: Go and make disciples! #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Church is young, as everyone can see at WYD.  May the Lord always keep us all young at heart. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Thank you to all of you and to all the authorities for a magnificent welcome in Rio. #Rio2013 #JMJ

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Today we begin a wonderful week in Rio; may it be a time to deepen our friendship in Jesus Christ.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I am arriving in Brazil in a few hours and my heart is already full of joy because soon I will be with you to celebrate the 28th WYD.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How many wish to be in Rio for WYD but can’t!  May they feel at one with us in prayer.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young friends, I know that many of you are still travelling to Rio.  May the Lord accompany you on your way.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Many of you have already arrived in Rio and many more are just arriving.  We will see one another there in only three days.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In this Year of Faith, let us remember that faith is not something we possess, but something we share.  Every Christian is an apostle.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: God is so merciful toward us.  We too should learn to be merciful, especially with those who suffer.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Prayer, humility, and charity toward all are essential in the Christian life: they are the way to holiness.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: For a Christian, life is not the product of mere chance, but the fruit of a call and personal love.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In this Year of Faith let us aim to do something concrete every day to know Jesus Christ better.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Lord, grant us the grace to weep over our indifference, over the cruelty that is in the world and in ourselves.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If we wish to follow Christ closely, we cannot choose an easy, quiet life.  It will be a demanding life, but full of joy.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christians are always full of hope; they should never get discouraged.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We pray for a heart which will embrace immigrants.  God will judge us upon how we have treated the most needy.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Lord speaks to us through the Scriptures and in our prayer.  Let us learn to keep silence before him, as we meditate upon the Gospel.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus is more than a friend.  He is a teacher of truth and life who shows us the way that leads to happiness.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christ’s love and friendship are no illusion.  On the Cross Jesus showed how real they are.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot live as Christians separate from the rock who is Christ.  He gives us strength and stability, but also joy and serenity.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: A Christian is never bored or sad.  Rather, the one who loves Christ is full of joy and radiates joy.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let’s learn to lose our lives for Christ, like a gift or a sacrifice.  With Christ we lose nothing!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus didn’t save us with an idea.  He humbled himself and became a man.  The Word became Flesh.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Charity, patience and tenderness are very beautiful gifts.  If you have them, you want to share them with others.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Are we ready to be Christians full-time, showing our commitment by word and deed?

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We are all sinners.  But may the Lord not let us be hypocrites.  Hypocrites don’t know the meaning of forgiveness, joy and the love of God.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If we have found in Jesus meaning for our own lives, we cannot be indifferent to those who are suffering and sad.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us never forget that it is the Lord who guides the Church.  He is the one who makes our apostolates fruitful.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christians are ready to proclaim the Gospel because they can’t hide the joy that comes from knowing Christ.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Are you angry with someone?  Pray for that person.  That is what Christian love is.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let the Church always be a place of mercy and hope, where everyone is welcomed, loved and forgiven.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How many kinds of moral and material poverty we face today as a result of denying God and putting so many idols in his place!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We must not be afraid of solidarity; rather let us make all we have and are available to God.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: With the “culture of waste”, human life is no longer considered the primary value to be respected and protected.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Consumerism has accustomed us to waste.  But throwing food away is like stealing it from the poor and hungry.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Care of creation is not just something God spoke of at the dawn of history: he entrusts it to each of us as part of his plan.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christ leads us to go out from ourselves more and more, to give ourselves and to serve others.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text:
Sometimes we know what we have to do, but we lack the courage to do it.
Let us learn from Mary how to make decisions, trusting in the Lord.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text:
The world tells us to seek success, power and money;
God tells us to seek humility, service and love.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In this Year of Faith, we pray to the Lord that the Church may always be a true family that brings God’s love to everyone.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The whole of salvation history is the story of God looking for us: he offers us love and welcomes us with tenderness.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Church is born from the supreme act of love on the Cross, from Jesus’ open side.  The Church is a family where we love and are loved.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, the Church expects great things of you and your generosity. Don’t be afraid to aim high.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Every time we give in to selfishness and say “No” to God, we spoil his loving plan for us.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We all have in our hearts some areas of unbelief. Let us say to the Lord: I believe!  Help my unbelief.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Miracles happen. But prayer is needed! Prayer that is courageous, struggling and persevering, not prayer that is a mere formality.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: On the feast of Mary Help of Christians I join the Catholics in China who trust in the protection of Our Lady of Sheshan and I pray for them

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Do I take the Gospel message of reconciliation and love into the places where I live and work?

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To live according to the Gospel is to fight against selfishness. The Gospel is forgiveness and peace; it is love that comes from God.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I am close to the families of all who died in the Oklahoma tornado, especially those who lost young children. Join me in praying for them.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Holy Spirit transforms and renews us, creates harmony and unity, and gives us courage and joy for mission.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We must learn from Mary, and we must imitate her unconditional readiness to receive Christ in her life.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Are our lives truly filled with the presence of God?  How many things take the place of God in my life each day?

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot be part-time Christians!  We should seek to live our faith at every moment of every day.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: It is God who gives life.  Let us respect and love human life, especially vulnerable life in a mother’s womb.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Am I faithful to Christ in my daily life?  Am I able to “show” my faith with respect but also with courage?

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for the many Christians in the world who still suffer persecution and violence.  May God grant them the courage of fidelity.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Holy Spirit helps us to view others with fresh eyes, seeing them always as brothers and sisters in Jesus, to be respected and loved.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Holy Spirit brings to our hearts a most precious gift: profound trust in God’s love and mercy.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I have come that they may have life and have it in abundance, says Jesus.  This is where true wealth is found, not in material things!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Do not be content to live a mediocre Christian life: walk with determination along the path of holiness.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us ask our Lord to help us bear shining witness to his mercy and his love in every area of our Christian lives.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Every Christian is a missionary to the extent that he or she bears witness to God’s love.  Be missionaries of God’s tenderness!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us ask Our Lady to teach us how to live out our faith in our daily lives and to make more room for the Lord.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: It would be a good idea, during May, for families to say the Rosary together.  Prayer strengthens family life.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: My thoughts turn to all who are unemployed, often as a result of a self-centred mindset bent on profit at any cost.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young friends, learn from Saint Joseph. He went through difficult times, but he always trusted, and he knew how to overcome adversity.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us put our trust in God’s power at work!  With him, we can do great things.  He will give us the joy of being his disciples.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How marvellous it would be if, at the end of the day, each of us could say: today I have performed an act of charity towards others!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Holy Spirit truly transforms us.  With our cooperation, he also wants to transform the world we live in.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text:
Join me in praying for the victims of the tragedy in Dhaka, Bangladesh,
that God will grant comfort and strength to their families

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, do not bury your talents, the gifts that God has given you!  Do not be afraid to dream of great things!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: At this time of crisis it is important not to become closed in on oneself, but rather to be open and attentive towards others.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us keep the flame of faith alive through prayer and the sacraments: let us make sure we do not forget God.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Mary is the one who says “Yes”.  Mary, help us to come to know the voice of Jesus better, and to follow it.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Each one of us longs for love, for truth, for life – and Jesus is all of these things in abundance!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: “The sheep that belong to me listen to my voice and I know them.” The voice of Jesus is unmistakable!  He guides us along the path of life.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Please join me in praying for the victims of the explosion in Texas and their families.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To enter into the glory of God demands daily fidelity to his will, even when it requires sacrifice.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus’ ascension into heaven does not mean his absence, but that he is alive among us in a new way, close to each one of us.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Worshipping God means learning to be with him, stripping away our hidden idols and placing him at the centre of our lives.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us not forget: if we are to proclaim the Gospel of Jesus, our lives must bear witness to what we preach.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If we act like children of God, knowing that he loves us, our lives will be made new, filled with serenity and joy.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Being a Christian is not just about following commandments: it is about letting Christ take possession of our lives and transform them.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How beautiful is the gaze with which Jesus regards us – how full of tenderness!  Let us never lose trust in the patience and mercy of God.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: God loves us.  We must not be afraid to love him.  The faith is professed with the lips and with the heart, through words and through love.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Accept the risen Jesus into your life. Even if you have been far away, take a small step towards him: he awaits you with open arms.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Support your priests with your love and prayers, that they may always be shepherds after Christ’s heart

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To experience Holy Week is to enter more and more into God's logic of love and self-giving

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Being with Jesus demands that we go out from ourselves, and from living a tired and habitual faith

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We must not believe the Evil One when he tells us that there is nothing we can do in the face of violence, injustice and sin.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I am looking forward to next July in Rio de Janeiro! I hope to see all of you in that great Brazilian city!

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: True power is service.  The Pope must serve all people, especially the poor, the weak, the vulnerable.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us keep a place for Christ in our lives, let us care for one another and let us be loving custodians of creation.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text:
Dear friends, I thank you from my heart and I ask you to continue to pray for me.  
Pope Francis.

user.name: Pope Francis
user.description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis
